mapper.select: select userId from user where username = #{username}

select userId,username,password,operateName,tel,email,status,createByUserId,createTime,updateTime,employCard,nickName from user where username = #{username} and status=${@com.ytoxl.module.user.dataobject.User@STATUS_ABLE}
select userId from user where createByUserId = #{userId} and status=#{status}
mapper.update: update user set lastLoginTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,updateTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select userId from user where email = #{email}
select createByUserId from user where userId=#{userId}
select status from user where username=#{username}

select count(u.userId) from user u where status=${@com.ytoxl.module.user.dataobject.User@STATUS_ABLE}
and u.userId in
#{createByUserId}
and u.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and u.operateName like concat('%',#{operateName},'%')
and u.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and u.email like concat('%',#{email},'%')
select userId from user where employCard = #{employCard} and status=${@com.ytoxl.module.user.dataobject.User@STATUS_ABLE}
select userId from user where email=#{uuid}
